name: QueSo
bio: I am NOT A ONE BY ONE LEGO PIECE.

messages.message: Listen here, loser, I'm in a predicament. Should I buy 58 big macs or 22 steakhouse burritos? I love McDonalds, but the steakhouse burrito is the best thing I have ever tasted. Quality over quantity? If you fail me, you're banned.

ai_replies.full: Big Macs are great, and you're getting way more food! Everybody needs to eat! Get the big macs for more food!
The 22 Steakhouse Burritos are probably better... Quality over quantity 100%

goto.message: Thanks! Hope I don't gain too much mass. I don't want to get too big.
Thanks for the advice, QoQ fr.
DID YOU JUST CALL ME FAT? YEAH YOU'RE BANNED. GET OUT OF MY STREAM!!!
